contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox F1 driver | name = Keith Andrews | nationality = {{flagicon|USA}} [[United States|American]] | birth_date = {{birth date|1920|6|15}} | death_date = {{death date and age|1957|5|15|1920|6|15}} | Years = {{F1|1955}}â€“{{F1|1957}} | Team(s) = [[Schroeder (constructor)|Schroeder]], [[Kurtis Kraft]] | Races = 3 (2 starts) | Championships = 0 | Wins = 0 | Podiums = 0 | Points = 0 | Poles = 0 | Fastest laps = 0 | First race = [[1955 Indianapolis 500]] | First win = | Last win = | Last race = [[1957 Indianapolis 500]] }} '''Keith Andrews''' (June 15, 1920, [[Denver, Colorado]] – May 15, 1957, [[Indianapolis]], [[Indiana]]) was an [[United States|American]] [[racecar driver]]. He was killed after crashing his car during testing for the [[1957 Indianapolis 500]]. The car was destroyed and Andrews died soon after. This prevented his teammate and only European entry, [[Giuseppe Farina]], from competing in the race. ==Indy 500 results== {{col-begin|width=auto}} {{col-break}} {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Year !Car !Start !Qual !Rank !Finish !Laps !Led !Retired |- ![[1955 Indianapolis 500|1955]] |31 |28 |136.049 |28 |20 |120 |0 |Ignition |- ![[1956 Indianapolis 500|1956]] |89 |20 |142.976 |13 |26 |94 |0 |Spun T4 |- |colspan=6|'''Totals''' |214 |0 | |} {{col-break|gap=1em}} {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Starts |2 |- !Poles |0 |- !Front Row |0 |- !Wins |0 |- !Top 5 |0 |- !Top 10 |0 |- !Retired |2 |} {{col-end}} ==Complete Formula One World Championship results== ([[:Template:F1 driver results legend 2|key]]) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" !
